str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
At one time or other, at some time, formerly. From the base of pou and te; indefinite adverb, at some time, ever.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To put into order; I decorate, deck, adorn. From kosmos; to put in proper order, i.e. Decorate; specially, to snuff.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Plural
Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: To hope, hope for, expect, trust. From elpis; to expect or confide.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: From hupo and tasso; to subordinate; reflexively, to obey.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
